verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to end all trade with America ’s G7 allies if they do n’t submit to his demands over reduced trade barriers] , [ARGM-ADV: while also suggested totally free trade among the group of nations] .

[ARG0: President Trump] threatened to [V: end] [ARG1: all trade with America ’s G7 allies] if they do n’t submit to his demands over reduced trade barriers , while also suggested totally free trade among the group of nations .

President Trump threatened to end all trade with America ’s G7 allies if they [V: do] n’t submit to his demands over reduced trade barriers , while also suggested totally free trade among the group of nations .

President Trump threatened to end all trade with America ’s G7 allies if [ARG0: they] do [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [V: submit] [ARG2: to his demands over reduced trade barriers] , while also suggested totally free trade among the group of nations .

President Trump threatened to end all trade with America ’s G7 allies if they do n’t submit to his demands over [V: reduced] [ARG1: trade barriers] , while also suggested totally free trade among the group of nations .

[ARG0: President Trump] threatened to end all trade with America ’s G7 allies if they do n’t submit to his demands over reduced trade barriers , while [ARGM-DIS: also] [V: suggested] [ARG1: totally free trade among the group of nations] .
